news.title: Tales of Double-Crossing, Big Egos and Cattle Brands Swirl Around Gerry Spence Lawsuits
news.description: Multiple lawsuits stemming from a 2020 organizational split of the Trial Lawyers College have pitted the legendary attorney Gerry Spence against board members in both state and federal courts.

news.title: Over 1,000 New Lawyers Get Licenses Without Taking Bar Exam
news.description: As a response to the COVID-19 pandemic, several state bar associations granted emergency diploma privilege to recent law school graduates to allow them to start practicing law.
